mapper.select: select c.ROW_ID as customNo, c.ID_CODE as idCard, c.PRI_PHONE as phone, c.LAST_NAME as custName, c.SEX as sex, c.BIRTH_DT as birthDate, c.LOCAL_CITY as localCity, c.HOME_ADDRESS as homeAddress, c.NATURE_STREET as natureStreet, p.PROVINCENAME as natureState, t.CITYNAME as natureCity, z.CITYZONENAME as natureCityzone from tb_contact c INNER JOIN tb_sys_province p ON c.NATURE_STATE = p.PROVINCEID INNER JOIN tb_sys_city t ON c.NATURE_CITY = t.CITYID INNER JOIN tb_sys_cityzone z ON c.NATURE_CITYZONE = z.CITYZONEID where c.ROW_ID = #{customerNo}
